Item 5.07 - Submission of Matters to a V.content: The 2024 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the “Annual Meeting”) of Apple Inc. (“Apple”) was held on February 28, 2024. At the Annual Meeting, Apple’s shareholders voted on the following eight proposals and cast their votes as described below.

subsections.Proposal 1: Election of Directors:
The individuals listed below were elected at the Annual Meeting to serve as directors of Apple until the next annual meeting of shareholders and until their successors are duly elected and qualified:

Director Nominee | For | Against | Abstained | Broker Non-Vote
--- | --- | --- | --- | ---
Wanda Austin | 9,071,238,739 | 41,808,115 | 20,441,053 | 3,275,055,901
Tim Cook | 8,981,334,503 | 138,150,021 | 14,003,383 | 3,275,055,901
Alex Gorsky | 8,952,997,553 | 160,822,837 | 19,667,517 | 3,275,055,901
Andrea Jung | 8,629,655,897 | 484,800,970 | 19,031,040 | 3,275,055,901
Art Levinson | 8,552,669,663 | 561,437,085 | 19,381,159 | 3,275,055,901
Monica Lozano | 9,039,170,194 | 74,381,943 | 19,935,770 | 3,275,055,901
Ron Sugar | 8,787,482,632 | 325,339,831 | 20,665,444 | 3,275,055,901
Sue Wagner | 8,957,887,476 | 155,887,705 | 19,712,726 | 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 2: Ratification of Independent:
A management proposal to ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as Apple’s independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal year 2024 was approved.

For: 12,211,115,276
Against: 164,034,315
Abstained: 33,394,217
subsections.Proposal 3: Advisory Resolution to Appro:
An advisory resolution to approve executive compensation was approved.

For: 8,385,653,963
Against: 702,309,882
Abstained: 45,524,062
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 4: Shareholder Proposal - EEO P:
A shareholder proposal entitled “EEO Policy Risk Report” was not approved.

For: 116,754,721
Against: 8,911,884,765
Abstained: 104,848,421
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 5: Shareholder Proposal - Repor:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Report on Ensuring Respect for Civil Liberties” was not approved.

For: 164,816,396
Against: 8,853,955,511
Abstained: 114,716,000
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 6: Shareholder Proposal - Racia:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Racial and Gender Pay Gaps” was not approved.

For: 2,817,465,452
Against: 6,248,518,245
Abstained: 67,504,210
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 7: Shareholder Proposal - Repor:
A shareholder proposal requesting a report on the use of AI was not approved.

For: 3,333,209,334
Against: 5,549,219,868
Abstained: 251,058,705
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
subsections.Proposal 8: Shareholder Proposal - Congr:
A shareholder proposal entitled “Congruency Report on Privacy and Human Rights” was not approved.

For: 147,994,563
Against: 8,879,045,656
Abstained: 106,447,688
Broker Non-Vote: 3,275,055,901
